name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Exploitation
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable web application to execute shell commands remotely, creating unauthorized user accounts and exfiltrating data.

action--c2e2e093-b744-4c20-8f4f-a0e8e8f1.name: Kill malicious process
action--c2e2e093-b744-4c20-8f4f-a0e8e8f1.description: Terminate any processes associated with the malicious script.

action--7cc2a728-f30d-4773-ac7b-3cc2c7d4.name: Remove unauthorized user
action--7cc2a728-f30d-4773-ac7b-3cc2c7d4.description: Delete any unauthorized user accounts created by the attacker.

parallel--2f8bcab3-d8f0-4cb1-a6f0-ee7c3e.name: Execute Further Mitigations
parallel--2f8bcab3-d8f0-4cb1-a6f0-ee7c3e.description: Block external IP and scan for malware in parallel.

action--a7d7e9c1-4b6f-4237-88b1-de8aa1fe.name: Block external IP addresses
action--a7d7e9c1-4b6f-4237-88b1-de8aa1fe.description: Prevent any further data exfiltration by blocking the attacker's IP address.

action--d1e7c705-4d75-4ad4-84f7-44e788b9.name: Scan for malware
action--d1e7c705-4d75-4ad4-84f7-44e788b9.description: Scan the system for any existing malware or threats.

loop--c40d56a9-96fd-4761-974b-efcf39fd0f.name: Check scan results
loop--c40d56a9-96fd-4761-974b-efcf39fd0f.description: Repeat the malware scan until there are no more threats detected.

action--f9f2b3a2-3e6d-45a4-bbda-ab0b5e7d.name: Review user activity logs
action--f9f2b3a2-3e6d-45a4-bbda-ab0b5e7d.description: Analyze the activity log for any suspicious actions performed by the unauthorized user.
